::Lord Elder::
=A0
Elder listened to Legacy over the commlink. He knew what=
 needed to be done. The Matrix Quest would have to be abandoned for now. Th=
ey must destroy these two Minions quickly and go to the Black Fortress to a=
id the Maximal rescue team... and the Predacons. There was just one thing a=
bout Legacy's statement that took over Elder's thoughts.
=A0
Elder: Corrupt=
ed Rodimus? What do you mean? We thought that he and Nightlight were just b=
eing held captive by the Predacons.

The shuttle continued to fire on th=
e Minions.

Legacy paused for a moment as =
he noted Nightstrike' s recovery and the appearance of a second minion: Dar=
kfate. As Nightstrike' s attacks further drained his shielding his shieldin=
g finally failed, and the minion's attack burned into his armor, causing mi=
nor damage! 
=A0
>=A0Elder: Suggestions? They are ehading towards Atlantis =
but we must also complete
>=A0the Matrix Quest and find out about the situa=
tion at the Black Fortress.
"ACCORDING TO HISTORICAL RECORD" Legacy stated =
after a pause, "CYCLONUS IS CURRENTLY DIRECTING HIS FLEET OF SWEEPS AGAINST=
 THE BLACK FORTRESS AS SCOURGE SOUGHT OUT THE CORRUPTED RODIMUS PRIME. ONCE=
 THE MINIONS REJOINED CYCLONUS, AND WITH THE POWER OF THE THEN=A0STOLEN SEC=
OND MATRIX THEY OVERWHELMED THE DEFENDERS THERE. I HAVE NO RECORD OF ANY EV=
ENTS IN ATLANTIS FOR THE NEXT SEVERAL EARTH DAYS, THESE ARE NEW EVENTS."
Le=
gacy quickly shifted form, assuming not his robot mode but his third form, =
that of a weapon's platform, or perhaps a satalite. In either case it was f=
light capable and manuverable. With the solar power he had been absorbing, =
he could once again utilize it. He rose swiftly into the air as he directed=
 his cannons at Darkfate and firing!
"MY SUGGESTION" Legacy continued, "WOU=
LD BE TO DESTROY THE MINIONS AT ALL COSTS, STARTING WITH THIER MILITARY HEA=
D CYCLONUS! IF HE IS NUETRALIZED THIS SET OF EVENTS WILL HALTED"

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Lord Elder::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder listened to Legacy over the commlink. He knew what needed to be done. The Matrix Quest would have to be abandoned for now. They must destroy these two Minions quickly and go to the Black Fortress to aid the Maximal rescue team... and the Predacons. There was just one thing about Legacy's statement that took over Elder's thoughts.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder: Corrupted Rodimus? What do you mean? We thought that he and Nightlight were just being held captive by the Predacons.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>The shuttle continued to fire on the Minions.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Sat, 6/21/08, Super Cyclonus <I><supercyclonus@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...><BR>Subject: Re: At The Ark<BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Saturday, June 21, 2008, 8:21 AM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv2014010869>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<P>> ::Lord Elder::<BR>><BR>> Elder watches at Darkfate's shots hit the shuttle, causeing some damage but<BR>> nothing serious.<BR>Legacy paused for a moment as he noted Nightstrike' s recovery and the appearance of a second minion: Darkfate. As Nightstrike' s attacks further drained his shielding his shielding finally failed, and the minion's attack burned into his armor, causing minor damage! <BR> <BR>> Elder: Suggestions? They are ehading towards Atlantis but we must also complete<BR>> the Matrix Quest and find out about the situation at the Black Fortress.<BR>"ACCORDING TO HISTORICAL RECORD" Legacy stated after a pause, "CYCLONUS IS CURRENTLY DIRECTING HIS FLEET OF SWEEPS AGAINST THE BLACK FORTRESS AS SCOURGE SOUGHT OUT THE CORRUPTED RODIMUS PRIME. ONCE THE MINIONS REJOINED CYCLONUS, AND WITH THE POWER OF THE THEN STOLEN SECOND MATRIX THEY OVERWHELMED THE DEFENDERS THERE. I HAVE NO RECORD OF ANY EVENTS
 IN ATLANTIS FOR THE NEXT SEVERAL EARTH DAYS, THESE ARE NEW EVENTS."<BR>Legacy quickly shifted form, assuming not his robot mode but his third form, that of a weapon's platform, or perhaps a satalite. In either case it was flight capable and manuverable. With the solar power he had been absorbing, he could once again utilize it. He rose swiftly into the air as he directed his cannons at Darkfate and firing!<BR>"MY SUGGESTION" Legacy continued, "WOULD BE TO DESTROY THE MINIONS AT ALL COSTS, STARTING WITH THIER MILITARY HEAD CYCLONUS! IF HE IS NUETRALIZED THIS SET OF EVENTS WILL HALTED"<BR>Preston<BR>(Legacy)<BR><BR></P></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
